entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Pemberton
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
